long_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 50 qt. Igloo Yukon Roller cooler. It delivers serious performance for outdoor use and is the ideal size for a weekend getaway. Rugged polyethylene construction with 3 in. of foam in the lid and 2 in. in the body provides excellent insulation to keep ice cold for up to 7 days in 90degF temperatures. Sturdy wheels and a convenient telescoping handle make it easy to get heavy loads in to your campsite. Rugged, wide integrated handles are easy to grasp with gloves on; handles double as tie-down loops. Raised, textured work surface on the lid; lid includes a measuring scale for determining whether or not your fish is a keeper. Oversized, tethered drain plug for easy draining and cleaning. Elevated design allows airflow underneath the cooler and keeps it off of hot surfaces to improve cooling performance. All stainless-steel hinge pins and hardware ensure many years of use. Lid on the Igloo Yukon Roller cooler can be locked shut for security (locks sold separately).
short_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 50 qt. Igloo Yukon Roller cooler. It delivers serious performance for outdoor use and is the ideal size for a weekend getaway.
